Hero.title: Organic Fruits
Hero.description: Fresh, organic fruits and vegetables sourced from nature. Experience the goodness of healthy, sustainable produce for a vibrant, nourishing lifestyle. From farm to table, our selection is carefully chosen to provide the freshest, most natural options.

AboutUs.title: Who Are We
AboutUs.subtitle: Al-Bayariq Al-Khadraa General Trading specializes in importing high-quality fresh fruits from various countries, catering to the needs of the Iraqi market. The company provides reliable distribution services to retailers and major markets, ensuring a wide variety of products to meet customer satisfaction.
AboutUs.subParagraph: From the bounties of Egypt and its agricultural lands
AboutUs.paragraph: Flourishing for thousands of years to meet your desires, we have the ability to export our products to all parts of the world
AboutUs.extraTitle: Importing fresh fruits from trusted sources to ensure top quality.
AboutUs.extraParagraph: An efficient distribution network covering all of Iraq.

Organic.slogan: FRESH FROM NATURE. STRAIGHT TO YOU.
Organic.title: Organic Produce for a Healthier Lifestyle
Organic.description: Experience the finest selection of organic fruits and vegetables. Carefully sourced to ensure quality, sustainability, and taste, our products help you live a healthier and more vibrant life.

services.title: Always Fresh
services.description: We care about what you eat and want to produce food which nourishes.

services.title: 100% Natural
services.description: All our products are completely natural with no additives.

services.title: Best Quality
services.description: We maintain the highest quality standards in all our products.

services.title: Food Safety
services.description: Your safety is our priority in every step of production.
